price: Yεbεba dwuma biara a (abͻneεfoͻ no) diiε no so, na Yεbεma no ayε sε mfuturo bi a atu ahweteε.
arabic: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqadim'nā ilā mā ʿamilū min ʿamalin fajaʿalnāhu habāan manthūran
